channel.title: Openrune server/client development team! Just need client team!
channel.description:
Hello we are looking for members to help us in our group named openrune. We plan on making a server and client as well as a pwnage website and are currently looking for some help. Plenty of positions are available! If you want in just apply here, more info will be on our official website http://openrune.org later. Current positions need are below and if accepted will be pmed with more info.
The server/client will work with silab items as well!!
Server owners/co-owners -Sicarius99 -Initial
Client development team -Initial -Sicarius99 - -
Server development team -Sicarius99 -Initial -Slump40 -mrtube
Forum mods -mrtube -Jordan7 -M,i,K,e positions full
Server tester -frooby -Machine Mikey -pure ownz01 [i]Server tester postions are full[/i]
In-game Mod -Jordan7 -pure ownz01 -doggiedoo86 We will add more on as we grow but its full for now
Perhaps more
1 person from the client and server development teams who contribute the most will be admins on the server.
Format when applying [code] 1.Position wanted: 2.Experience in the position: 3.Coding experience: 4.E-mail: 5.AIM/MSN/YIM(please specify): 6.First Name: 7.Last Name: [/code]

item.title: Openrune server/client development team! Just need client team!

item.description:
@sicarius99 wrote:

Ok everyone the forums and website are now launched at http://openrune.org, all developers please register.

7.Last Name:(dont need to know)

I guarantee you that this will not die in 2 days … i will keep it going for as long as i possibly can.

so if you want in post an application
[/quote]
I seen it happen to many times. You will come to see from my point of view in time.[/quote]

Well the shit you saw isn’t the case with this server

[quote=“M,i,K,e, post:33, topic:145837”]Position wanted: Forum Moderator.

Experience in the position: Well I am currently a Global Moderator on BlakScapes’ forums owner [Blakdaddy], and I moderate on my forums when it has people.

Coding experience: I personally say I’m still at the basics, but it has nothing much to do with Forum Moderating.

E-mail: PloxieScape@Ploxiescape.com

MSN: Boomk_xd@hotmail.com
Usually only on Ploxiescape@ploxiescape.com

First Name: Mike

Last Name: Rather not say.[/quote]

[u]Accepted[/u]

Add me on MSN

Read your PM'S once in a while sicarius hint hint

its hard with all these noobs asking me for help with there servers
